taxon_identification.other_info_on_name: [For Charles Deering, frequent sponsor of J. K. Small in his botanical explorations]

references.reference: Kral, R. 1983c. Deeringothamnus. In: R. Kral, ed. 1983. A Report on Some Rare, Threatened, or Endangered Forest-related Plants of the South. Washington. Pp. 452-456. [U.S.D.A.
